question: Which nation houses the "Saltworks of Pedra de Lume"?
explanation: Saltworks of Pedra de Lume is located in Cape Verde. Portuguese discovered the island of Sal of Barlavento Islands in the 15th century. Until the 18th century,f it was uninhabited and was extremely arid and only used to grazing, fishing and salt extraction. This saline site is formed in the crater of an extinct volcano. Island started inhabited for the extraction of salt. During the 19th century, the port of Pedra Lume was established and the salt industry was nationalised after independence.
